casebody.data:
In the Matter of CITY OF LONG BEACH, Appellant,
v.
SUN NLF LIMITED PARTNERSHIP, et al., Respondents, Louis Bombart et al., Respondents. Motion No: 2017-1073 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided on December 19, 2017

Motion for leave to appeal denied with one hundred dollars costs and necessary reproduction disbursements.
